mapper.insert: insert into starred (id, name, dir, type, ext, size, real_path, in_recycled, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dir,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{realPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inRecycled,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update starred set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dir = #{dir,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ext = #{ext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, size = #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}, real_path = #{realPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, in_recycled = #{inRecycled,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, dir, type, ext, size, real_path, in_recycled, create_time from starred
